TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to configure Ksi definition.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the Ksi definition API /api/ksidefinitions. Verify that Ksi definition can be configured.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify Ksi configuration.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify Ksi configuration.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify Ksi configuration.
